name: The Card Dilemma
description:
Best Played not in full screen

Made in 82h for the Wowie Jam 4.0. The theme was: "Collaborate with AI". 

_______________________________________

You and your best friend (an AI) got kidnapped and now have to play a game of cards against each other where the loser gets eliminated. You need to finish the cards with no one dying so you and your friend could go back home. Also keep an eye on the timer, once that reaches zero the one with the least amount of health dies, better watch out!

Cards: 1- sword: 2- heart: 3- broken heart: 4- flower: Also the red version of the cards do the same effect as the normal version just double ______________________________________ Credits:

 - L0rd : Programming 

- PixelBox : Art

 - Jafar Dakhan : Art & sound effects 

- Diia Blood (Dark Time) : Music
